code: var _require=require("../../backend"),API=_require.API;export var getmeToken=function getmeToken(userid,token){return fetch("".concat(API,"/payment/gettoken/").concat(userid),{method:"GET",headers:{Accept:"application/json","Content-Type":"application/json",Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}}).then(function(response){return response.json();}).catch(function(err){return err.json();});};export var processPayment=function processPayment(userid,token,paymentInfo){return fetch("".concat(API,"/payment/braintree/").concat(userid),{method:"POST",headers:{Accept:"application/json","Content-Type":"application/json",Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)},body:JSON.stringify(paymentInfo)}).then(function(response){return response.json();}).catch(function(err){return err.json();});};
